verses.text: \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, who shall abide in thy tabernacle? who shall dwell in thy holy hill?
He that walketh uprightly, and worketh righteousness, and speaketh the truth in his heart.
He thatbackbiteth not with his tongue, nor doeth evil to his neighbour, nor taketh up a reproach against his neighbour.
In whose eyes a vile person is contemned; but he honoureth them that fear the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*. He thatsweareth to his ownhurt, and changeth not.
He thatputteth not out his money to usury, nor taketh reward against the innocent. He that doeth these thingsshall never be moved.
